parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Premature Tire Wear and Alignment Issues
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Premature tire wear can lead to unexpected blowouts, which can cause accidents, injuries, or fatalities. Misaligned tires can also affect vehicle handling, leading to loss of control or accidents.
symptoms: excessive wear on the inside shoulders

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Failure of the front suspension and steering components can cause loss of control, accidents, or injuries.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Rear Suspension and Shock Absorber Issues
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Failure of the rear suspension and shock absorbers can cause loss of control, accidents, or injuries.
The failure of the power steering system can cause the steering wheel to become stiff or lock up, making it difficult or impossible to control the vehicle, which can lead to accidents or injuries.
symptoms: The steering wheel becomes stiff or locks up
the power steering light turns on
the steering wheel is difficult to turn
the vehicle is hard to maneuver

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The intermittent loss of power steering can cause the driver to lose control of the vehicle, leading to accidents or injuries.
symptoms: the steering wheel becomes stiff or locks up
the power steering light turns on
the steering system fails while driving
the vehicle is hard to maneuver.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Steering System Failure due to Suspension/Steering System Defect
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The defect in the suspension/steering system can cause uneven tire wear, leading to hazardous situations on the road, and can also cause the power steering system to fail.
Premature tire wear can lead to a loss of traction, increased risk of tire failure, and accidents, which can result in injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: Excessive wear on the inside of the tires

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Lack of Manufacturer Support and Warranty Issues
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Failure to provide adequate warranty information and support can lead to financial burdens on customers and a lack of trust in the manufacturer.
symptoms: lack of support from dealerships and manufacturers
